snippet: Despite Bob Dole’s wishes, Republicans voted against a treaty that would ban discrimination against people with disabilities, out of fear that it would infringe on American sovereignty.
abstract: Senate Republicans vote down United Nations treaty that would ban discrimination against people with disabilities, despite impassioned plea from Sen John Kerry and appearance and support of former Sen Bob Dole, who is disabled.
lead_paragraph: Despite Bob Dole’s wishes, Republicans voted against a treaty that would ban discrimination against people with disabilities, out of fear that it would infringe on American sovereignty.

headline.seo: Despite Bob Dole’s Wish, Republicans Reject Disabilities Treaty
headline.main: Dole Appears, but G.O.P. Rejects a Disabilities Treaty
headline.print_headline: Dole Appears, but G.O.P. Rejects a Disabilities Treaty
